name: Relevant Communications
tagline: The forefront of bringing global brands
description: Relevant Communications is a results-driven Public Relations, Publicity and Marketing Agency working with a vast and varied repertoire of clients within the fine art and museum world as well as the discipline and market track of consumer branding. Relevant has been an industry leader in the world of fine art gallery initiatives and celebrity artist publicity; garnering international, national, regional and local in-market press for gallery events.
